description:
Monitor for newly executed processes that may exploit software vulnerabilities in an attempt to elevate privileges. Note: Event IDs are for Sysmon (Event ID 1 - process create) and Windows Security Log (Event ID 4688 - a new process has been created). The Analytic is oriented around looking for an invocation of either spoolsv.exe or conhost.exe by a user, thus alerting us of any potentially malicious activity. A common way of escalating privileges in a system is by externally invoking and exploiting these executables, both of which are legitimate Windows applications.

Analytic 1 - Unusual Child Process for spoolsv.exe or connhost.exe

processes = filter processes where ( (event_id == "1" OR event_id == "4688") AND (exe =="C:\Windows\System32\spoolsv.exe" OR exe =="C:\Windows\System32\conhost.exe") AND parent_image_path == "C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe")
